description:
Madoka sees a cute girl drag off Kyosuke, who finds her interesting, but he can`t help feeling there is something off about her, especially when she offers him... everything.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyosuke in a Pinch! Sweet Nothings at the Wuthering Heights
Kyousuke Pinch! Arashi ga Oka no Amai Sasayaki
恭介ピンチ!嵐が丘の甘いささやき
